In reply to rsdk.

Thanks for the feedback. I will try to give an update for whonix.

item.title: Comment on Single Command to Download and Install All Bangla Fonts in Your Linux by rsdk
item.dc:creator: rsdk
item.description: Salam, thanks brother for your wolderful script. I used this in many linux distros so far, but stuck up with whonix, a debian 10x based privacy oriented distro. .. would you plaese give it a try and make a solution for us !
item.content:encoded: Salam, thanks brother for your wolderful script. I used this in many linux distros so far, but stuck up with whonix, a debian 10x based privacy oriented distro. .. would you plaese give it a try and make a solution for us !
